# Overview

This notebook calculates metrics from a population density map
by comparing them with a gold standard map. The maps are

```{r}
pareto_pops <- function(n) {
  quantiles <- seq(0, 1, 1 / n)[1:n]
  sort(VGAM::qpareto(quantiles, scale = 1, shape = log(5, 4)))
}

pops <- pareto_pops(10^2)
pops <- sort(VGAM::rpareto(10^6, scale = 1, shape = log(5, 4)))
cumulant <- cumsum(pops) / sum(pops)
inverse <- c(length(pops):1) / length(pops)
plot(cumulant, type = "l", col = "green")
lines(inverse, col = "blue")
```
